notes.title: Special Fireteam
notes.note: Up to 1 Order Sergeant can join a Knights Hospitallers or a Teuton Knights Fireteam. Except Crusade Fireteams

notes.title: Special Fireteam: Core
notes.note: Up to 1 Black Friar (Albedo, Biometric Visor L1) can join a Fireteam: Core of Order Sergeants

notes.title: Special Fireteam: Core
notes.note: Father-Knights can join a Fireteam: Core of Order Sergeants

notes.title: Specialist Sergeant
notes.note: Specialist Sergeants cannot be members of a Fireteam

notes.title: Special Fireteam: Core
notes.note: Up to 1 Black Friar (Albedo, Biometric Visor L1) can join a Fireteam: Core of Order Sergeants

notes.title: Special Fireteam: Core
notes.note: Crusade Fireteam. Joan of Arc (any version) + 4 Knights Hospitallers

notes.title: Special Fireteam
notes.note: Up to 1 Order Sergeant can join a Knights Hospitallers or a Teuton Knights Fireteam. Except Crusade Fireteams

notes.title: Wildcard Trooper
notes.note: Knights of Santiago can join any Fireteam of this Sectorial Army

notes.title: Special Fireteam: Core
notes.note: Crusade Fireteam. Joan of Arc (any version) + 4 Knights Hospitallers

notes.title: Special Fireteam
notes.note: Up to 1 Order Sergeant can join a Knights Hospitallers or a Teuton Knights Fireteam. Except Crusade Fireteams

notes.title: Special Fireteam
notes.note: Magister Knights count as Teuton Knights for Fireteam composition

notes.title: Special Fireteam: Core
notes.note: Father-Knights can join a Fireteam: Core of Order Sergeants

notes.title: Special Fireteam
notes.note: Magister Knights count as Teuton Knights for Fireteam composition

notes.title: Special Fireteam
notes.note: De Fersen counts as a Knight Hospitaller for Fireteam composition

notes.title: Special Fireteam: Core
notes.note: Crusade Fireteam. Joan of Arc (any version) + 4 Knights Hospitallers. Example: Joan of Arc (any version) + De Fersen + 1 K. of Santiago + 2 K. Hospitallers

notes.title: Special Fireteam
notes.note: Joan of Arc (any version) can join any Fireteam: Duo of this Sectorial Army

notes.title: Special Fireteam: Core
notes.note: Crusade Fireteam. Joan of Arc (any version) + 4 Knights Hospitallers. Example: Joan of Arc (any version) + De Fersen + 1 K. of Santiago + 2 K. Hospitallers

notes.title: Special Fireteam
notes.note: Joan of Arc (any version) can join any Fireteam: Duo of this Sectorial Army

childs.comment: Varuna Div. is only available in Varuna
SAA is only available in Shock Army of Acontecimento
NCA is only available in Neoterran Capitaline Army
Varuna Div. is only available in Varuna

notes.title: Special Fireteam
notes.note: Up to 1 Order Sergeant can join a Knights Hospitallers or a Teuton Knights Fireteam. Except Crusade Fireteams

notes.title: Special Fireteam: Core
notes.note: Up to 1 Black Friar (Albedo, Biometric Visor L1) can join a Fireteam: Core of Order Sergeants

notes.title: Special Fireteam: Core
notes.note: Father-Knights can join a Fireteam: Core of Order Sergeants

notes.title: Special Fireteam
notes.note: Konstantinos (non-Infiltrating option) counts as an Order Sergeant for Fireteam composition
